name: Tofu Green Goddess Dressing
author: Sylvia Fountaine, Feasting at Home
ingredients: 1 tbsp white wine vinegar (sub. sherry/apple cider)
1 cup fresh herbs (parsley, dill & tarragon is best, can also use basil)
method: Place all ingredients except the herbs and spring onions in a blender. Blend until smooth, adding up to one more tablespoon water, if necessary, to get the blender going.
Scrape down sides, add the fresh herbs and spring onions blend again. Taste, adjust salt and lemon. Store in a jar in the fridge.
